reviewText: These are the streaming version but you can get it in DVD as well. What you will witness in this 270 minutes, is pure love and affection between different species of animals as well as animals and humans. This covers 6 episodes so although you nay not get the HD version with the DVDs, it will cost you as much to watch it streaming. The major difference would be if you have kids, there is hardly any production that can introduce your kids to the wild like this National Geographic production for years to come. You will truly appreciate every second of this 270 minute beauty since there is no love like true love that does not distinguish race, color, religion, size or specie. Bravo, bravo, bravo.

Many of the segments are worthy of watching over & again. Very happy with purchase.
I just love the Unlikely Animal Friends series.
This is definitely a good one to watch with my kids. This is so nice and so full of fun.
Very touching movie.  Loved it and would recommend it for family viewing.
My dogs and cat are on episode six...so of course it's fantastic
